name: Chongyun
title: Banisher of Evil and Rumors Thereof
description: A young exortcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his pure positive energy.

normalattack.name: Demonbane
normalattack.description: Performs up to four consecutive strikes. When charged, performs continuous swirling attacks.

elementalskill.name: Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost
elementalskill.description: He strikes the ground causing an ice explosion that deals Cryo DMG. After that, it creates a Chonghua Frost Field that turns all Normal and Charged Attacks into Cryo DMG.

elementalburst.name: Spirit Blade - Cloud-Parting Star
elementalburst.description: Summons three giant blades that fall to earth and explode to deal Cryo DMG.

passivetalent1.name: Gallant Journey
passivetalent1.description: When dispatched to Liyue, the time taken to complete the task is reduced by 25%.

passivetalent2.name: Steady Breathing
passivetalent2.description: Attack SPD increases 8% for all characters with Swords, Claymores, and Polearms within the Chongua's Layered Frost field.

passivetalent3.name: Rimechaser Blade
passivetalent3.description: When the Chonghua's Layered Frost field disappears, another spirit shows up to deal 100% of Chonhua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as AoE Cryo DMG. Enemies hit feel Cryo RES decreases by 10% for 8s.

constellations.d1: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all enemies in its path.
constellations.d2: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade - Chongyun's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an enemy affected by Cold or Frozen status effects. 
 This effect can only occur once every 2s.
constellations.d5:
Increases the level of Spirit Blade - Chongyun's Layered Frost by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6:
Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star deals 15% more DMG to enemies with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun. 
 This skill will also summon 1 additional spirt blade.

profile.description:
With Liyue as his base of operations, the exorcist Chongyun roams the land, ridding it of evil. As the heir to a clan of exorcists, he has always possessed abilities superior to most. However, this ability is not the result of training, but of an inborn trait he has come to term, "congenital positivity."
Congenital positivity is an exceedingly rare physiology that makes the body susceptible to heating up due to an overabundance of positive energy. If unchecked, those who possess such a form can easily become hot blooded. Chongyun is a particularly serious case, his shifts in mood are explosive, and he remembers nothing from such episodes. However, Chongyun's condition is also his greatest asset, for all he needs to do to expel evil spirits is to sit awhile in whatever dark corner they may haunt.
As such, Chongyun's path as an exorcist has been smooth as smooth can be. However, he himself does not approve of this manner of doing things. In his honest and upright heart, leaning on his unique physiology to exorcise evil is but a cheap trick. An exorcist must, in his estimation, perform their duties with an exorcist's arts.
To counteract this congenital positivity, Chongyun has several disciplines that he practices. He does not go out in the sun or wear thick clothes, and he abstains from hot beverages and hot and spicy food. He takes up no quarrels, and he indulges no tempers. Yet despite searching high and low, and far and wide, he has been unable to find a lasting solution to his condition.
This troubled the young exorcist. The evil spirits were expelled, yes, but if things kept going like this, how would he ever prove himself to be a qualified exorcist?
As he sits atop an ice-capped mountain chewing on a snow bun, Chongyun cannot help but sigh. The road ahead is still long indeed.

zhdescription: 驱邪世家的年轻方士，为压制自身的【纯阳之体】费尽心机。

zhnormalattack.name: 灭邪四式
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击：进行至多四段的连续挥砍。

重击：持续消耗体力，旋转大剑攻击周围的敌人。 停止旋转时，会进行一次格外有力的挥砍。

zhelementalskill.name: 重华叠霜·灵刃
zhelementalskill.description:
重云挥动巨剑猛击地面，在前方圆形范围内引发冰爆，并对敌人造成冰元素伤害。
短暂延迟后，冰爆引发的寒气汇聚成重华叠霜领域，其中的单手剑、双手剑、长柄武器角色的普通攻击与重击伤害将变为冰元素伤害。

zhelementalburst.name: 灵刃·云开星落
zhelementalburst.description:
重云结印，在前方半空中连续召唤出三柄巨大灵刃，短时间内依次落向地面并爆裂。
灵刃爆裂时，会造成冰元素范围伤害，并击飞敌人。

zhpassivetalent1.name: 吐纳真定
zhpassivetalent1.description: 处在灵刃·重华叠霜领域内的单手剑、双手剑、长柄武器角色，普通攻击的攻击速度提升8%。

zhpassivetalent2.name: 追冰剑诀
zhpassivetalent2.description: 灵刃·重华叠霜领域消失时，会唤出一柄灵刃自动攻击附近的敌人，造成相当于灵刃·重华叠霜技能伤害100%的冰元素范围伤害。被击中的敌人冰元素抗性降低10%，持续8秒。

zhpassivetalent3.name: 云游山海
zhpassivetalent3.description: 在璃月执行探索派遣任务时，消耗的时间缩短25%。

zhconstellations.d1: 普通攻击的最后一击会向前方释放三道冰之刃，每道冰之刃对沿途的敌人造成重云50%攻击力的冰元素伤害。
zhconstellations.d2: 在灵刃·重华叠霜领域内施放的元素战技与元素爆发的冷却时间减少15%。
zhconstellations.d3: 灵刃·云开星落的技能等级提高3级。至多提升至15级。
zhconstellations.d4: 重云的所有攻击命中受到冰元素影响的敌人时，自身将恢复1点元素能量。该效果每2秒最多触发一次。
zhconstellations.d5: 灵刃·重华叠霜的技能等级提高3级。至多提升至15级。
zhconstellations.d6: 灵刃·云开星落对生命值百分比低于重云的敌人造成伤害时，伤害提升15%; 此外，施放时，会召唤一柄额外的灵刃。
